mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_PIC (POST_PIC_SEQ, PATH, FILE_NAME, POST_SEQ) values (#{postPicSeq }, #{path }, #{fileName }, #{postSeq })
mapper.select: SELECT POST_PIC_SEQ as postPicSeq, PATH as path, FILE_NAME as fileName, POST_SEQ as postSeq, CRT_DATE as crtDate FROM POST_PIC WHERE POST_PIC_SEQ = #{integer }
